section1.h3: Unlock the full power of ha
section1.text:
Thanks to our comprehensive offer from beauty to medical usages (aesthetic medicine, gynecology, rheumatology, ophthalmology, anti-ageing skincare), we create life-changing solutions. We believe hyaluronic acid (HA) is an exceptional ingredient that has just started proving its powers. Our goal? Explore further and take it to the next level.

Mobilising our state-of-the art R&D capabilities, we constantly disrupt markets with advanced bio-compatible technologies and new reversible usages, setting the highest quality standards. As impact-driven entrepreneurs, we aim to build on HA to positively impact people’s everyday life.

section2.text:
VIVACY stands as a key player in the medical aesthetics market. Founded in 2007, this French company specializes in manufacturing dermal filler products based on hyaluronic acid, tailored specifically for aesthetic and anti-aging treatments. Laboratoires VIVACY distributes its products not only in France but also in over 75 other countries. Aesthetic doctors, surgeons, and dermatologists worldwide rely on VIVACY’s renowned STYLAGE® range. What sets it apart is its patented hyaluronic acid stabilization technology, ensuring long-lasting results. With 15 years of medical expertise, the STYLAGE® range holds a CE mark.

Available as transparent, absorbable gel formulations, these products cater precisely to patients’ diverse aesthetic requirements, including wrinkle filling, skin hydration, and loss of facial volume, among others. Your practitioner will devise a personalized treatment plan based on your specific needs, selecting the appropriate products to ensure optimal results.

keyNumbers.1: In 10 years, the production capacity has increased by a factor of 5 (3 million syringes per year)
keyNumbers.2: Sales growth of over 20% per year for 15 years
keyNumbers.3: More than 80 countries 80% of sales generated outside France

section4.textTop:
- IPN-LIKE TECHNOLOGY

TECHNOLOGY ON THE MOVE: HYALURONIC ACID, A “MOLECULE TO MOISTURIZE”
section4.textCore:
All VIVACY’s products are hyaluronic acid-based. Hyaluronic acid (HA) is a naturally occurring molecule in the human body, particularly in the skin and mucous membranes. It can retain up to 1,000 times its weight in water2, consequently contributing to the hydration and toning of the concerned tissues3.

HA has a short life span and is soluble in water, meaning it needs to be stabilised before injection into skin tissues. To do so, a special technical process called “cross-linking” is used to bind HA molecules together to obtain a cohesive HA gel for a skin smoothing, lifting and/or volumising effect that will last for several months. The duration of the treatment depends on many factors, such as the patient’s skin type and structure, age, lifestyle, the area treated and the injection technique used by the practitioner.

vivacySecurity.h2: Vivacy is with you every day
vivacySecurity.content: Scan a product to verify its authenticity using RFID technology and access our digitized instructions. Explore our pre and post-injection advice for a serene treatment experience.

section1.content:
Laboratoires VIVACY stands out in aesthetic and anti-aging treatments with hyaluronic acid-based fillers, particularly the STYLAGE® range, renowned for its patented technology and long-lasting results. In 2011, VIVACY innovated in functional and aesthetic gynecology with the first injectable gel for vulvo-vaginal restoration.

Pursuing excellence, VIVACY offers premium skincare lines for women and men, developed with dermatologists and skin biology experts. These products use the VIVASÔME complex, which encapsulates active ingredients for optimal absorption by the skin.

Collaborating with over 250,000 doctors worldwide, VIVACY designs and tests its products in close cooperation with healthcare professionals. The company also supports dermatological research, scientific training, and social initiatives, reflecting a deep commitment to the medical community and patient well-being.

content.c1: The STYLAGE® range by Laboratoires VIVACY stands out with innovative solutions for diverse aesthetic needs. STYLAGE® S, M, and L are specifically formulated to fill wrinkles, while STYLAGE® Special Lips Lidocaine and STYLAGE® Lips Plus focus on hydrating and volumizing lips.
content.c2: To restore or enhance facial volumes, STYLAGE® offers XL, XL LIDOCAINE, and XXL versions. Lastly, STYLAGE® HYDRO and HYDROMAX are designed to improve skin hydration and elasticity. With these versatile products, STYLAGE® meets a wide range of needs for both patients and healthcare professionals.

content.c1: DESIRIAL® is specifically designed to restore hydration and firmness in the vulvo-vaginal area for women experiencing vaginal dryness. With innovative formulations incorporating hyaluronic acid and antioxidants, DESIRIAL® provides effective solutions to enhance comfort and improve quality of life for affected women.

section1.content:
Laboratoires VIVACY is a prominent player in the field of medical aesthetics and anti-aging. Established in 2007, this esteemed French company has rapidly specialized in creating, producing, and distributing cutting-edge medical devices based on hyaluronic acid. Operating primarily in France, Vivacy has expanded its reach across more than 75 countries globally, craving out a significant niche in the competitive landscape of medical aesthetic.

For over 16 years, Laboratoires VIVACY has demonstrated unwavering dedication to the development of injectable medical devices specifically tailored for healthcare professionals. The aim of the company is enhance the natural beauty of individuals, achieving remarkable results without drastic alterations. This core philosophy is deeply embedded in the brand’s identity and has been primordial in earning the trust of medical practitioners and patients.

section2.content:
Consequently, VIVACY is committed to providing practitioners worldwide with the finest medical innovations in terms of quality, effectiveness, and safety. Its product range encompasses three main categories:

  • STYLAGE® series focusing on facial aesthetics
  • DESIRIAL® line addressing gynecological applications
  • VIVACY BEAUTY range of dermo-cosmetic productsAdditionally

Laboratoires Vivacy manufactures hyaluronic acid gels for ophthalmic surgery like I-SPACE®, along with viscosupplementation products such as KARTILAGE® for treating knee osteoarthritis pain.

With its unparalleled expertise, VIVACY has cultivated an extensive portfolio of premium products featuring innovative medical properties. These injectable formulations are meticulously designed by expert teams and serve as the basis for numerous clinical studies.

section3.content:
Laboratoires VIVACY’s advanced production facility in Archamps, France, highlights the company’s dedication to excellence. Complying with strict EU medical device regulations, this facility ensures all products are safe and effective. These products are then distributed globally to meet the growing demand from aesthetic doctors and healthcare professionals.

Healthcare professionals around the world trust VIVACY’s hyaluronic acid products for their ability to enhance natural beauty subtly and effectively. This trust is based on the consistent quality and innovation of VIVACY’s offerings, making the company a leading partner in medical aesthetics and anti-ageing solutions.

section4.h2: Discovering the heart of laboratoires vivacy

quality.title: Quality
quality.content: For 16 years, Laboratoires VIVACY’s objective has always been to offer practitioners and patients the best products in terms of quality, performance and security. All products are meticulously manufactured in France at the advanced facility in Archamps Technopole, a hub of French research and innovation. Laboratoires VIVACY maintain complete control over every stage of production without compromise.

security.title: Security
security.content: Laboratoires VIVACY uses pharmaceutical-grade raw materials and operates in highly secure white rooms to ensure the purity and safety of the gel manufacturing process. Each syringe undergoes manual inspection by trained operators before market release.

authenticity.title: Authenticity
authenticity.content: In its commitment to guaranteeing safe, quality products for practitioners and patients worldwide, Laboratoires VIVACY launched an innovative authentication system for the injectable products in 2017. Each box is equipped with a uniquely numbered RFID* chip to verify the origin of STYLAGE® or DESIRIAL® injectables and combat counterfeiting. Practitioners can verify product’s authenticity using the « MY VIVACY » mobile app.

efficiency.title: Efficiency
efficiency.content: Laboratoires VIVACY have developed clinical studies for the injectable products to prove the good tolerance and efficiency when it comes to the desired results. All studies are conducted with expert oversight and patient panels managed by certified centers. The STYLAGE® range holds CE marking in Europe and certifications in several countries, supported by over 16 years of clinical experience.

section2.h2: Promoting well-being of people and the planet

first.content:
During the Odyssea event, 171 members of our VIVACY teams and associated distributors worldwide walked and ran to support this vital cause. For us, maintaining our commitment to this cause is crucial, as we shine a spotlight on women’s health and provide medical professionals with the knowledge and tools to shape a better future.

Together, we stand united in the fight against breast cancer.At VIVACY, we firmly believe in the importance of raising awareness about this disease and providing tangible support to initiatives working towards its eradication. Participating in events like Odyssea is a concrete way for us to demonstrate our solidarity and commitment to this crucial cause.

second.h2: Ethics at the heart of our actions
second.content:
At Laboratoires VIVACY, we take pride in our commitment to gender equality. The law for the Freedom to Choose One’s Professional Future of September 5, 2018, imposes on companies an obligation to achieve results regarding gender equality.

At VIVACY, gender parity is not just about legal compliance; it is a fundamental value that we nurture every day. We firmly believe that gender diversity is a strength that fuels our innovation and growth. Our commitment to gender parity is reflected in our outstanding rating of 99/100 on the Gender Equality Index for the year 2023.

third.content:
The Laboratoires VIVACY, aware of the current environmental challenges, have equipped their new industrial site with innovative ecological solutions. Featuring vegetated parking lots and a large-scale photovoltaic installation, this site stands out as one of the pioneers in sustainability in the Auvergne Rhône-Alpes region.

In partnership with local companies such as Syan’EnR, VOLTEC Solar, and EPC Solaire, VIVACY has installed no less than 830 solar panels on the site’s roof. This collaboration demonstrates VIVACY’s commitment to the development of renewable energies and the local economy.

fourth.content: The Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes region supports part of Laboratoires VIVACY’s investments, which demonstrates their strong local presence. This financial support underscores the regional authorities’ confidence in the quality and innovation of Laboratoires VIVACY. Consequently, Laboratoires VIVACY continues to contribute to the economic dynamism of the region.  This partnership shows the importance of the biomedical industry in the Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes economic fabric.

section1.content: Our Research & Development laboratory, based in Archamps, is a site entirely dedicated to innovation in the fields of Anti-Aging and Aesthetics. It is here that our injectable products are born, designed and developed by a team of passionate experts.

section2.content: We invest 10% of our annual revenue in R&D, thus demonstrating our ongoing commitment to innovation. With 16 years of experience, we have developed a strong expertise in our field. Over the past 8 years, our production capacity has increased by 11-fold, reflecting our commitment to meeting the growing demand for our products.

first.h2: Innovation at the heart of vivacy
first.content: We are proud of our 2 patented technologies: IPN-Like and Bi-SOFT®, which exemplify our dedication to innovation and our pursuit of advanced solutions in the field of aesthetic injections. The IPN-Like technology enhances the durability and performance of our dermal fillers, while the Bi-SOFT® injection system provides practitioners with a more precise and comfortable injection experience.

second.h2: Building strong relations with physicians and patients
second.content:
Trust and reliability are the cornerstones of our relationship with healthcare professionals and patients. With over 7 million syringes sold worldwide between 2008 and 2018, we have established ourselves as a trusted partner in the field of aesthetic medicine. Our products are renowned for their safety and effectiveness, and they are used by practitioners around the globe.

This trust is built on a foundation of rigorous testing, quality control, and unwavering commitment to upholding the highest standards across all aspects of our operations.
